name: Dr. Sarah Mukamana
bio: Specialized in community nutrition and malnutrition prevention in East Africa. Expert in affordable meal planning using local ingredients.

name: Dr. James Ochieng
bio: Focuses on diabetes management and weight control through evidence-based nutrition interventions. Works with diverse populations across Africa.

name: Dr. Aisha Bello
bio: Expert in child nutrition and preventing malnutrition in vulnerable populations. Passionate about culturally appropriate meal planning.

name: Dr. Priya Sharma
bio: Specializes in vegetarian and vegan nutrition, helping people achieve optimal health through plant-based diets. Expert in Indian cuisine.

name: Dr. Michael Chen
bio: Helps athletes and active individuals optimize performance through strategic nutrition. Also works with general population on weight management.

name: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
bio: Expert in managing metabolic conditions through diet. Specializes in diabetes, PCOS, and cardiovascular health through nutrition therapy.
